static sort_features(new_features: list[VisualFeature], matches: list[DMatch]) → tuple[list[VisualFeature], list[int], list[VisualFeature]][source]

Sorts new visual features into matched and unmatched categories based on matches.

Parameters:

  • new_features – List of new visual features of type VisualFeature.

  • matches – List of cv2.DMatch objects representing the matches.

Returns:

list of matched new visual features. list of indices corresponding to the matched features in the existing list of features. list of unmatched new visual features.

Return type:

A tuple containing

moduslam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.smart_visual_features.utils.create_edge(base_vertex: CameraPose, support_vertex: Feature3D, visual_feature: VisualFeature, measurement: Measurement, smart_factor: SmartProjectionPose3Factor, noise_model: Covariance) → SmartVisualFeature[source]

Creates an edge.

Parameters:

  • base_vertex – optimizable vertex with camera pose.

  • support_vertex – non-optimizable vertex with the visual feature position.

  • visual_feature – visual feature.

  • measurement – measurement with visual features.

  • smart_factor – GTSAM factor.

  • noise_model – GTSAM noise model.

Returns:

new edge.

Creates an edge.

Parameters:

  • measurement – measurement with visual features.

  • feature_storage – storage of visual features.

  • smart_factor_factory – factory to create smart factors.
